verses.kjv: I will lift up mine eyes unto the hills, from whence cometh my help.
verses.ct: I look up toward the mountains â€” where does my help come from?

verses.kjv: My help cometh from the LORD, which made heaven and earth.
verses.ct: My help comes from the LORD, who made heaven and earth.

verses.kjv: He will not suffer thy foot to be moved: he that keepeth thee will not slumber.
verses.ct: He won't let your foot slip; the one who watches over you never dozes off.

verses.kjv: Behold, he that keepeth Israel shall neither slumber nor sleep.
verses.ct: The one who guards Israel never dozes off and never falls asleep.

verses.kjv: The LORD is thy keeper: the LORD is thy shade upon thy right hand.
verses.ct: The LORD is your protector; the LORD stands at your right side like shade.

verses.kjv: The sun shall not smite thee by day, nor the moon by night.
verses.ct: The sun won't strike you during the day, and the moon won't harm you at night.

verses.kjv: The LORD shall preserve thee from all evil: he shall preserve thy soul.
verses.ct: The LORD will keep you safe from every danger; he will protect your soul.

verses.kjv: The LORD shall preserve thy going out and thy coming in from this time forth, and even for evermore.
verses.ct: The LORD will watch over your leaving and your returning, from now until forever.
